# findInteraction

**Instance Property**

The text view’s built-in find interaction.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var findInteraction: UIFindInteraction? { get }
```

## Discussion

Set [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextView/isFindInteractionEnabled] to `true` to enable the text view’s built-in find interaction. This method returns `nil` when the interaction isn’t enabled.

Call [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFindInteraction/presentFindNavigator(showingReplace:)] on the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFindInteraction] object returned by this method to invoke the find interaction and display the find panel.

## Supporting Find and Replace

- **isFindInteractionEnabled**: A Boolean value that enables a text view’s built-in find interaction.
